TextView.android:text: Are you clinically tested positive (+) for COVID-19?
Be your own Doctor,\nAnswer the question to the best of your knowledge!
Note: This is based on current understanding of the disease which is subject to change. Please do consult a doctor and take their advice in case you are not feeling well.
Answer the questions to the best of your knowledge!
Do you have Hoarseness in Voice?
Do you have Lose of smell and taste?
Do you currently have any of these health conditions?
Have you or someone in your family staying with you came in close contact with a laboratory confirmed COVID-19 patient in the last 14 days without protective gear?
